content: --आत्मन्, --बुद्धि {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} one whose soul is purified by meditating on the Supreme spirit, one who has perceived the Supreme soul. {2} pure, devout, holy; <ls>Pt. 3. 66.</ls> {3} thoughtful, meditative; <ls>R. 1. 74</ls> {4} engaged in, occupied with; <ls>Śi. 12. 38.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} a sage, saint.
